p.k: When will clueless Jmac realize that the hottest babe in the neighborhood, Abella Danger, is hitting on him? Will it be when she invites herself at his place, claiming her washing machine broke and she has to do laundry? Will it be she'll bend down in front of his machine, almost brushing her sweet butt against his crotch? It seems like Abella will have to go as far as fingering herself on top of Jmac's appliance. Tickled, Jmac accepts Abella's invitation to her horny party of two.
